title: Advanced Indonesian Emotional Expression: Cultural Context Analysis and Statistical Approach to Pain Vocabulary

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Indonesian communication skills, foundational understanding of emotional expression vocabulary, and ability to interpret statistical graphs and basic probability concepts
context.additional_context: Professional development course for pre- or in-service teachers. Parallel training in language data interpretation using mathematical analysis techniques (frequency analysis, graph interpretation, probability calculations).

learning_goals: Establish mathematical classification criteria to distinguish the physical focus and intensity differences of Indonesian pain expressions "sakit" and "nyeri" with 90% accuracy.
Visualize the frequency of emotional vocabulary usage as probability distributions and graphs using corpus analysis tools (e.g., AntConc).
Write localization strategy reports based on cross-cultural pain expression analysis and present statistically significant validation results.

resources: Translated Version of Wierzbicka's Pain Analysis Framework

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
